name: Color 101 (HEX Workshop)
description:
Let's talk about color! This workshop will provide a brief overview on what color is and how to use it effectively. We'll touch on color theory, harmony, and tips for creating cohesive color palettes â€” applicable in design, illustration, photography, and anywhere else you use color!


This file was created for Innovative Design's Hone & Explore Workshops on Saturday (2-3 pm) at UC Berkeley. HEX Workshops are held every semester and are open to all students, alumni, friends, and family - no experience is necessary. Workshops are 1 hour long, covering a variety of different disciplines ranging from graphic design, photography, web design, and more. Learn more at hex.innovativedesign.club.
